title: Partners Forever
overview: Jimmy is an honest cop preparing to turn damning evidence against corrupt higher officials. The night before his Internal Affairs appearance, however, he's severely ambushed while on a stakeout, passing away in the arms of his faithful partner, Gina, portrayed by Temptress. A year later, a spectral Jimmy returns from the afterlife to protect his wife — Alexa — from falling into the clutches of the same evil forces that orchestrated his demise. Temptress soon finds herself exploring an exotic sexual netherworld in which sensual fulfillment crosses the very borders of life itself.
